<<<<<<< HEAD
The citizens joy for the rebuilding of London.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by P. Lillicrap for Richard Head, at the Heart in Bible in Little-Brittain. Where you may have Mr. Matthews his approved and universal pill for all diseases, London, : 1667.
Verse: "LONDON lies Grovelling on the Earth, yet beggs ..." "With allowance." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
